text: Metroprolol (brand names Lopressor and Toprol XL) is a beta blocker medication. Metoprolol was first made in 1969, patented in 1970, and approved for medical use in 1978. It is on the World Health Organization's List of Essential Medicines. It is available as a generic medication. In 2021, it was the sixth most commonly prescribed medication in the United States, with more than 65million prescriptions.Source Wikipedia ==Related pages== * Beta blocker * Statin == References == Category:Beta blockers
title: Metoprolol
